_sText:
Hi guys, now i'd to introduce zm_marbble_v2, a revision of my original map zm_marbble.
First of all the fixes from v1: revamped and balanced spots, better optimization, better lighting...keys to make a good-looking map.

Now, this v2 comes with:

- 64 spawnpoints, for you big server owners.
- Barricade spots, from hard to easy, none of them are impossible for zombies.
- Climbing spots, box-based or just climbing up a wall. All of them balanced.
- Volumetric lighting and cubemaps for you eye candy lovers.
- Featuring a "foggy morning" sunlight setting, for ambience.

And of course, glitch-free.
I hope you like this map and do not hesitate to flame me if you find this map stupid!
Maps will keep coming from Marioâ„¢ and me, so stay tuned!
